author: DistroTube
description:
Arch Linux is one of the most popular Linux distros. What are the reasons for the popularity of Arch? Here's my list of reasons...

0:00 Intro
0:34 Rolling Release Model
2:33 AUR
3:24 DIY Philosophy
4:48 Community Rather Than Corporate
5:55 Arch Wiki
6:46 Gaming
7:28 Easy Installation
9:09 Makes You A Better Linux User

REFERENCED:
► https://archlinux.org/
